name: Chuck, The Adventures of Sir Charles the Small
name_original: Chuck, The Adventures of Sir Charles the Small
description:
You find yourself in a dungeon, next to a giant exit sign, find the way out by fighting your way through a variety of enemies and pitfalls, while listening to an original score by Cody Loyd in this Hollow-knight inspired metroidvania.

Built for the Metroidvania Month 5 game-jam: https://itch.io/jam/metroidvania-month-5
